subject-English: The organisation connects the front office interaction with the back office execution in a seamless manner.
題目-Chinese: 公司前、後台互動作業是緊密連結的。

subject-English: There is a clear content plan with clear objectives for your audience.
題目-Chinese: 公司已針對其閱聽對象設計目標明確且內容清晰的計畫。

subject-English: Brand content is proactively promoted on external platforms.
題目-Chinese: 公司已在外部平台積極推動品牌內容。

subject-English: There is a structured process to evaluate user generated content on owned platforms.
題目-Chinese: 公司已在自有平台建置結構化的流程，以評估用戶的原創內容。

subject-English: Search Engine research is used to help create the right content across your digital channels.
題目-Chinese: 公司將搜尋引擎研究結果運用在增進數位化通路的正確內容。

subject-English: Digital marketing can be accessed across all devices.
題目-Chinese: 消費者能在所有的裝置上體驗數位化行銷。

subject-English: Gamification is used to immerse/reward/encourage or entertain your customer in your brand.
題目-Chinese: 公司使用遊戲化的設計激勵客戶使用其服務，並增加品牌忠誠度。

subject-English: Digital marketing content is personalised and targeted to the individual.
題目-Chinese: 公司數位化行銷內容針對個人，並主打個人化設計。

subject-English: Targeted digital marketing is pushed to your customers when "on the go".
題目-Chinese: 能「隨時隨地」對消費者進行數位化行銷。

subject-English: Processes are in place to enable experimentation with digital marketing strategies quickly and easily.
題目-Chinese: 公司已制定能快速檢驗數位化行銷績效的相關程序。

subject-English: Integrated digital marketing is delivered across multiple touch points with a unified message.
題目-Chinese: 公司已整合數位化行銷，於各接觸點傳遞一致的訊息。

subject-English: Customers are communicated with using online video content.
題目-Chinese: 公司透過線上影片內容與消費者互動。

subject-English: Customers are encouraged and enabled to collaborate with your brand by providing customer ratings, reviews and recommendations.
題目-Chinese: 鼓勵消費者透過評分、評論以及推薦，協助推廣公司品牌。

subject-English: Offline marketing is integrated with digital marketing.
題目-Chinese: 將實體行銷與數位化行銷整合為一體。

subject-English: Banner advertising and " pop-ups" are used as the main form of digital marketing.
題目-Chinese: 將橫幅廣告和“彈出式窗口”作為數位化行銷的主要形式。

subject-English: Your brand requires customers to proactively search for product information.
題目-Chinese: 公司品牌需消費者主動搜尋產品訊息才能得知。

subject-English: There is a focus on user generated content.
題目-Chinese: 注重用戶原創內容。

subject-English: There is a dedicated digital marketing budget.
題目-Chinese: 公司具備數位化行銷專用預算。

subject-English: There is a dedicated digital marketing strategy.
題目-Chinese: 公司具備數位化行銷專屬策略。

subject-English: There is a dedicated digital marketing team.
題目-Chinese: 公司具備數位化行銷專門團隊。

subject-English: There is a defined social media strategy in place which is aligned to the company business plan, with relevant and engaging content.
題目-Chinese: 具有與公司計畫一致，目標明確、引人入勝的社群媒體策略。

subject-English: There is an up-to-date social media policy/guidelines in place.
題目-Chinese: 具有最新的社群媒體政策/指南。

subject-English: Social media channels are open to employees across the business in order to enforce a social media culture.
題目-Chinese: 為了增強社群媒體文化，將社群媒體管道開放給員工使用。

subject-English: There is buy-in from company leadership who are the change drivers for the use of social media.
題目-Chinese: 公司領導人接受社群媒體的使用並帶頭引領其變革。

subject-English: There are social media listening/monitoring tools in place which monitor the business's reputation.
題目-Chinese: 公司具有能監控企業聲譽的社群媒體傾聽/監控工具。

subject-English: Emergency/crisis response is understood and integrated into social listening.
題目-Chinese: 緊急/危機時的回應能被理解、整合進社群傾聽工具。

subject-English: Social listening is structured so that conversations are evaluated and analysed in a systematic way.
題目-Chinese: 建構社群傾聽工具以評估談話內容並系統性分析。

subject-English: Web analytics tools support both web and social media analytics but are not integrated to provide a single view.
題目-Chinese: 網路分析工具能支援網站與社群媒體分析，但不能被整合成單一觀點。

subject-English: Social media enables the promotion of the business's products and services through targeted advertising.
題目-Chinese: 社群媒體透過精準行銷推廣產品與服務。

subject-English: Social media enables the purchase of the business's products and services.
題目-Chinese: 社群媒體增進產品與服務的購買量。

subject-English: Social media is used to provide customer service in order to improve customer loyalty.
題目-Chinese: 使用社群媒體提供服務以增進消費者忠誠度。

subject-English: The social media tone of voice is fully integrated with the rest of the business's communication channels.
題目-Chinese: 社群媒體的發展基調與其他的溝通管道完全整合。

subject-English: There are social media security procedures in place to prevent hacking.
題目-Chinese: 公司具有社群媒體防護程序以避免駭客入侵。

subject-English: There is a social media training programme for employees.
題目-Chinese: 公司有為員工設計社群媒體培訓計畫。

subject-English: Social media is looked at on an ad-hoc basis.
題目-Chinese: 公司將社群媒體經營視為特別業務看待。

subject-English: Feedback via digital channels is requested on products, services and customer experience at key points of interaction.
題目-Chinese: 透過數位化通路收集產品、服務與消費者體驗的意見回饋是互動的關鍵。

subject-English: A customer has the ability to raise and resolve a complaint through any digital channel.
題目-Chinese: 消費者可透過任何的數位化管道投訴並得到解決。

subject-English: A customer has the ability to raise and resolve a query through any digital channel.
題目-Chinese: 消費者可透過任何的數位化管道提出問題並得到解決。

subject-English: The organisation uses crowdsourcing tools and techniques to gain customer feedback on products and services.
題目-Chinese: 公司運用網路集體創作的工具得到消費者對產品與服務的意見回饋。

subject-English: The organisation responds to online complaints and queries by post only.
題目-Chinese: 公司只用張貼文章的方式回應網路上的抱怨與問題。

subject-English: Online feedback is routed into a continuous improvement programme and actioned.
題目-Chinese: 線上意見回饋是一個付諸行動、持續改良的計畫。

subject-English: Customers have the ability to interact and collaborate through online communities to drive feedback for improvement.
題目-Chinese: 消費者能透過線上社群互動與合作，提供如何改進的意見。

subject-English: The organisation monitors social media sites to capture customer feedback and ideas.
題目-Chinese: 公司透過社群媒體擷取消費者意見回饋與想法。

subject-English: Customers have the ability to track the progress of a complaint or query online.
題目-Chinese: 消費者能追蹤線上客訴與詢問的處理流程。

subject-English: Customers have the ability to track the progress of a query using mobile channels.
題目-Chinese: 消費者能使用行動通路追蹤問題處理流程。

subject-English: The organisation proactively follows up with customers to assess satisfaction.
題目-Chinese: 公司積極維持客戶的後續連繫以評估顧客滿意度。

subject-English: The organisation uses "live chat" technology to support customers when using digital channels.
題目-Chinese: 公司提供消費者線上聊天的功能。

subject-English: The customer has the ability to contact the product or service provider about any product held to ask a query or make a complaint.
題目-Chinese: 消費者能聯絡上產品或服務的提供者，對其發問或是投訴。

subject-English: The ability to personalise your content is fundamental to your digital strategy.
題目-Chinese: 消費者能將網頁內容個人化。

subject-English: Personalised web content is targeted in the right context in real time.
題目-Chinese: 個人化網頁內容有對的情境和即時性。

subject-English: The performance of personalised content is tested monitored and measured.
題目-Chinese: 個人化內容的成效將被測試、監控與衡量。

subject-English: Your website experience is personalised for individual visitors.
題目-Chinese: 公司對於每個訪客皆提供客製化的網站瀏覽體驗。

subject-English: Data from CRM systems or data warehouses is used to create personalised web experiences.
題目-Chinese: 公司使用CRM系統或數據倉庫的數據資料，設計個人化的網路體驗。

subject-English: The improvement in conversion rates resulting from online personalisation can be quantified.
題目-Chinese: 公司能量化因個人化內容而提昇的交易轉換率。

subject-English: Personalised experiences are only delivered through desktop.
題目-Chinese: 消費者只能透過桌上型電腦享受個人化的網路體驗。

subject-English: Effectiveness of personalisation is tested using A/B or multivariant testing.
題目-Chinese: 公司使用比較（A/B testing）或多元試驗測試個人化服務的成效。
